snippet: The appointment is seen as part of Kim Jong-un’s effort to tighten his grip on power.
abstract: North Korea removes hard-line general Kim Kyok-sik from post of armed forces minister, filling the job with a little-known three-star general, Jang Jong-nam; appointment is seen as part of Kim Jong-un's effort to tighten his grip on power.
lead_paragraph: The appointment is seen as part of Kim Jong-un’s effort to tighten his grip on power.

headline.seo: North Korea Names Armed Forces Minister
headline.main: North Korea Names Armed Forces Minister
headline.print_headline: North Korea: Hard-Line General Is Out
